title: Implement chosen calling convention in runtime and codegen
body:
Implement the calling convention chosen in 12-01 in the Zig runtime and LLVM codegen.

**Deliverables (adjust based on research outcome):**
- Calling convention implementation in GRIN→LLVM code generation
- Runtime support for the convention (entry points, argument passing, return values)
- Partial application handling (PAP objects or equivalent)
- Over-application handling (apply extra args to result)
- Unit tests and integration tests

**Design notes:**
- This issue depends on both the research decision (12-01) and the LLVM backend skeleton (09-02)
- The interpreter (Epic #8) may use a simpler calling model; this is for compiled code
